mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.promotion_cid AS "promotionCid", a.name AS "name", a.shopid AS "shopid"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oms_commodity_column a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_commodity_column( id, promotion_cid, name, shopid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{promotionCid}, #{name}, #{shopid} )
